name: Project Flashlight
description:
Project Flashlight.

Flashlight is a first-person horror game. You are a girl that wake up in a house surrounded by mysteries. Try to find a way out while you deep in the past of the house and the secrets involving the death of a man.

Notes:

This game was made as a project of a game develoment college.  It very old project so it might be some bugs and performance problems. It is for portfolio purposes only but your feedback are  very important to us. 

Game in PT/BR.
